scripts.db:generate: cd ./apps/webapi && pnpx @better-auth/cli@latest generate --config ./src/lib/auth-generate.ts --output ./src/lib/auth-schema.ts && npx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd ./apps/webapi && wrangler d1 migrations apply uprompt-mono-db
scripts.db:migrate:remote: cd ./apps/webapi && wrangler d1 migrations apply uprompt-mono-db --remote
scripts.cf:deploy: pnpm --filter webapp build && cd ./apps/webapi && wrangler deploy --minify
